H3.text: who played samantha stephens in bewitched. Elizabeth Montgomery

A4.text: Elizabeth Victoria Montgomery portrayed the good witch Samantha Stephens on the popular television series Bewitched

A5.text: The series Bewitched, in which Elizabeth Victoria Montgomery played Samantha Stephens, aired for eight seasons from 1964 to 1972
